malp.Entities

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • malp.Entities.Entity
      • malp.Entities.Arrow

  • public class Arrow
extends Entity
    This class represents the arrow Entity which is shot by the Player to kill enemy entities..

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double angle
      The angle the arrow "flies" at, in radians ranging from 0 to two pi.
      private int distance
      The distance the arrow has traveled since it was shot by the shoot(double, double, double) method.
      private int hitCount
      The number of enemy entities the arrow has hit since it was shot.
      private int maxDistance
      The maximum distance the arrow can travel since it was shot by the shoot(double, double, double) method.
      private int maxHits
      The maximum number of enemies the arrow can hit per shot.
      private int velocity
      The velocity at which the arrow travels at.

      • Fields inherited from class malp.Entities.Entity

        alive, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Arrow(double x, double y, double angle)
      Instantiates a new arrow.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draw the entity on-screen.
      void hit()
      Called by the GameEngine whenever it detects a collision between the arrow and an enemy entity such as the Skull.
      void shoot(double x, double y, double angle)
      Shoots the arrow from a given position at a given angle.
      void update()
      Moves the arrow at the appropriate angle and determines whether the arrow's lifespan is up.

      • Methods inherited from class malp.Entities.Entity

        getX, getY, isAlive, isCollided, kill, setX, setY

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(double x,
             double y,
             double angle)
        Instantiates a new arrow.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to shoot from
        y - The y coordinate to shoot from
        angle - The angle, in radians, at which the arrow "flies" at

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Moves the arrow at the appropriate angle and determines whether the arrow's lifespan is up.
        Specified by:
        update in class Entity
        See Also:
        Entity.update()

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Draw the entity on-screen.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Entity

      • shoot

        public void shoot(double x,
                  double y,
                  double angle)
        Shoots the arrow from a given position at a given angle.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate
        angle - The angle, in radians, at which the arrow "flies"

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Called by the GameEngine whenever it detects a collision between the arrow and an enemy entity such as the Skull. This increases the hitCount value to ensure that the arrow can only hit a set number of entities each shot.
